briefTitle: Evaluation of the Subjectively Perceived Pelvic Floor Function in Patients With Gynecological Tumors and Breast Cancer Under Systemic Tumor Therapy Using a Validated Questionnaire
officialTitle: PANTHERA-Studie "Pelvic Floor Disorders in Patients Under ANtineoplastic THERApy"
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breastcancer under tumor therapy
* Gynecological carcinoma under tumor therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* none
